mapper.select: select notice_id as noticeId, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_date as noticeDate from (select rownum rnum, b.* from (select * from notice) b where rownum <= #{minRow}) where rnum >= #{maxRow}
select notice_id noticeId, notice_title noticeTitle, notice_content noticeContent, notice_writer noticeWriter, notice_date noticeDate from notice where notice_id = #{noticeId}
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_content = #{noticeContent} where notice_id = #{noticeId}
